ComicInfo.Summary:
“BOUND TO FATE,” Part Four
The cat returns (and she brings grim tidings)!
The wayward begin their final assault on the Loom of Fate… and not all of them will survive.
*List of covers and their creators:* | Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | |-------|---------|------------------------------------|------------------| | A | Cover A | Steven Cummings & Tamra Bonvillain | 1 | | B | Cover B | W. Scott Forbes | Missing |
